Nov. 10, 2018 D US Open Brass Band Championships
US Open Brass Band Championships 0 Entertainments Contest
us-open-brass-band-championships
First Contest 2003.
Norris Cultural Arts Center, St. Charles, Illinois, USA Most entertaining Band: Dublin Silver Band Best Performance of March: Prairie Brass Band Best new Brass Arrangement or Composition: 'Heat of the Day' by Josh Jameson Best Percussion Section: Milwaukee Festival Band Best Soloist: David Fencl in 'This is my Story'
Nov. 29, 2018, 3:05 p.m. Nov. 12, 2019, 4:14 p.m.
1 Arkansas Musicworks Brass Band William Ratcliff
2 Dublin Silver Band Tim Jameson
3 Milwaukee Festival Brass Mark A. Taylor
4 Prairie Brass Band Dallas Niermeyer
